SEARCH
Package repositories

Class OpportunityRepository

java.lang.Object
repositories.OpportunityRepository
public class OpportunityRepository extends Object
Stores and retrieves InternshipOpportunity entities. Acts as an in-memory data access layer for all the listed Interns.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(InternshipOpportunity opp)
      Saves or updates an internship opportunity. If the opportunity already exits (same Id), replaces it.
      Parameters:
      opp - InternshipOpportunity

    • findById

      public InternshipOpportunity findById(String id)
      Finds an opportunity by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - InternshipOpportunity Id
      Returns:
      InternshipOpportunity if there is one by that Id, null if none

    • findApprovedVisibleByFilter

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> findApprovedVisibleByFilter(ReportFilter filter)
      Finds all approved and visible opportunities that match the given report filter. If filter is null, returns all approved and visible opportunities.
      Parameters:
      filter - ReportFilter for the filter settings
      Returns:
      List of InternshipOpportunity by the filter

    • findByCompany

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> findByCompany(String company)
      Returns all opportunities belonging to a given company.
      Parameters:
      company - String companyName
      Returns:
      List of InternshipOpportunity by the company

    • findAll

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> findAll()
      Returns all opportunities stored (for testing or reports).

    • findByRepresentative

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> findByRepresentative(CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Returns all opportunities created by a specific representative.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(InternshipOpportunity opp)
      Deletes the provided opportunity instance if it exists.
      Returns:
      true if the opportunity was removed, false otherwise.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all stored opportunities (used for testing or system reset).

    • reloadFromDisk

      public void reloadFromDisk()
      Reload from disk.
